docs.snippet: Dale Bumpers, a former Arkansas governor and U.S. senator who earned the nickname "giant killer" for taking down incumbents, and who gave a passionate speech defending Bill Clinton during the president's impeachment trial, has died. He was 90....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dale Bumpers, a former Arkansas governor and U.S. senator who earned the nickname "giant killer" for taking down incumbents, and who gave a passionate speech defending Bill Clinton during the president's impeachment trial, has died. He was 90.

headline.main: Ex-Arkansas Governor, US Senator Dale Bumpers Dies at Age 90
headline.print_headline: Ex-Arkansas Governor, US Senator Dale Bumpers Dies at Age 90

docs.snippet: At all cost the man in the white beard had to be kept away from the men with black beards....
docs.lead_paragraph: At all cost the man in the white beard had to be kept away from the men with black beards.
docs.abstract: Kamel Daoud Op-Ed article describes how Islamists across Muslim world conducted campaign against Christmas in 2015; notes Prophet Muhammad's birthday coincided with Jesus' birthday for first time in 500 years, but Islamists view celebrations of any prophet's birth as Western, and thus crime; draws parallels between ideology of Islamists and that of far-right National Front in France.
